message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  I've done my research, and I know it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you.  To make this a truly advantageous deal for both of us, I'm willing to sell it for $1,150,000.  This price point ensures a significant return on your investment while allowing me to achieve my desired profit margin.  What do you say?  Let's discuss further.
